channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee, LLC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee, LLC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-3593|2024-09-17T00:16:44.003Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: Exploitation of Privilege/Trust vulnerability in Microsoft Windows client in McAfee Total Protection (MTP) Prior to 16.0.R18 allows local users to bypass product self-protection, tamper with policies and product files, and uninstall McAfee software without permission via specially crafted malware.

item.title: CVE-2019-3644|2024-09-17T01:11:51.259Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) earlier than 7.8.2.13 is vulnerable to a remote attacker exploiting CVE-2019-9517, potentially leading to a denial of service. This affects the scanning proxies.

item.title: CVE-2020-7332|2024-09-17T00:30:40.241Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- endpoint%20security%20for%20windows
item.description: Cross Site Request Forgery vulnerability in the firewall ePO extension of McAfee Endpoint Security (ENS) prior to 10.7.0 November 2020 Update allows an attacker to execute arbitrary HTML code due to incorrect security configuration.
